messages.author: Evan Martin
messages.text: hooray, for once utf-8 everywhere pays off.

messages.author: Evan Martin
messages.text: I still think this is wrong -- I think it should be some API on browser directly.  Maybe browser_->Go() would do it?  Oh, but we lose the transition type.  Maybe via the navigation controller?  In any case, can be fixed later.

messages.author: Evan Stade
messages.text:
On 2009/02/18 00:44:35, Evan Martin wrote:
> I still think this is wrong -- I think it should be some API on browser
> directly.  Maybe browser_->Go() would do it?  Oh, but we lose the transition
> type.  Maybe via the navigation controller?  In any case, can be fixed later.

I believe it would be:

browser->OpenURLFromTab(NULL, GURL(url), GURL(),
                        CURRENT_TAB,      PageTransition::TYPED);

but when I tried to do this before, it didn't work because it created a new RenderWidgetHostView, so our hack in BrowserWindowGtk broke it.
